name: karma-spec-reporter
description: A Karma plugin. Report all spec-results to console (like mocha's spec reporter).

scripts.coverage: istanbul cover -x test/**/*.js node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec test/**/*.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Michael Lex <michael.lex@codecentric.de>
